extends java.lang.Object
implements BeaconMasterService

        public org.json.simple.JSONArray beaconsList(java.lang.String search)

        Specified by:

      • beaconInfo

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject beaconInfo(java.lang.String bconId,
                                    int stdId)
        This beaconInfo method will get beacon details from database based on studio id and beacon id.
        Specified by:
        beaconInfo in interface BeaconMasterService
        Parameters:
        bconId - A primary key of beacon element.
        stdId - A primary key of studio element
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject which contains whole details of beacon element.

      • saveBeacon

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject saveBeacon(java.lang.String bconId,
                                    int staType,
                                    int stdId,
                                    java.lang.String detectType,
                                    java.lang.String bconStatus)
        This method used to save a beacon details into database.It will return a beacon id (primary key) of just inserted or updated beacon. If already beacon data exist in database then it will update information otherwise it will add into new record.
        Specified by:
        saveBeacon in interface BeaconMasterService
        Parameters:
        bconId - This string holds beacon unique website address.
        staType - This integer holds studio activity type (event / challenge).
        stdId - This integer holds the unique studio id.
        detectType - This string holds beacon type (Own / Fiternity).
        bconStatus - This string holds beacon status (Active / Inactive).
        Returns:
        it will return just inserted beacon id.
